organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: Virginia Tech cornerback Victor Harris said yesterday that he believed shots fired into his apartment over the weekend were random. “I don’t have any enemies or nothing like that,” said Harris, a junior. “The shootings were very random, and the police are looking into it.” Three Tech students were in the off-campus apartment just before 4 a.m. Sunday when it was hit with at least two gunshots. The police said no one was injured. No one has been arrested.
